segment.source: Get the tools needed to customize Windows
segment.target: Get the tools needed to customize Windows

segment.source: Get the tools needed to customize Windows
segment.target: Get the tools needed to customize Windows

segment.source: Get the tools needed to customize Windows
segment.target: Get the tools needed to customize Windows

segment.source: Here's what you'll need to start testing and deploying devices:
segment.target: Here's what you'll need to start testing and deploying devices:

segment.source: PCs
segment.target: PCs

segment.source: Here's how we'll refer to them:
segment.target: Here's how we'll refer to them:

segment.source: Technician PC: Your work PC.
segment.target: Technician PC: Your work PC.

segment.source: This PC should have at least 15GB of free space for installing the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) and for modifying Windows images.
segment.target: This PC should have at least 15GB of free space for installing the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) and for modifying Windows images.

segment.source: We recommend either Windows 10 or Windows 8.1 with the latest updates.
segment.target: We recommend either Windows 10 or Windows 8.1 with the latest updates.

segment.source: The minimum requirement is Windows 7 SP1, though this may require additional tools or workarounds for tasks such as mounting .ISO images.
segment.target: The minimum requirement is Windows 7 SP1, though this may require additional tools or workarounds for tasks such as mounting .ISO images.

segment.source: Reference device: A test PC or tablet that represents all of the devices in a single model line; for example, the Fabrikam Notebook PC Series 1.
segment.target: Reference device: A test PC or tablet that represents all of the devices in a single model line; for example, the Fabrikam Notebook PC Series 1.

segment.source: This device must meet the Windows 10 minimum hardware requirements.
segment.target: This device must meet the Windows 10 minimum hardware requirements.

segment.source: You'll reformat this device as part of the walkthrough.
segment.target: You'll reformat this device as part of the walkthrough.

segment.source: Storage
segment.target: Storage

segment.source: A USB key that's at least 8GB and can be formatted.
segment.target: A USB key that's at least 8GB and can be formatted.

segment.source: It should not be a Windows-to-Go key or a key marked as a non-removable drive.
segment.target: It should not be a Windows-to-Go key or a key marked as a non-removable drive.

segment.source: A second USB key or an external USB hard drive for storing files.
segment.target: A second USB key or an external USB hard drive for storing files.

segment.source: Minimum free space: 8GB, using NTFS, ExFAT, or any other file system that allows files over 4GB.
segment.target: Minimum free space: 8GB, using NTFS, ExFAT, or any other file system that allows files over 4GB.

segment.source: When possible, use USB 3.0 keys/drives in USB 3.0 ports to speed up file copy procedures.
segment.target: When possible, use USB 3.0 keys/drives in USB 3.0 ports to speed up file copy procedures.

segment.source: Some USB 3.0 keys may not work with some USB 2.0 ports.
segment.target: Some USB 3.0 keys may not work with some USB 2.0 ports.

segment.source: Software
segment.target: Software

segment.source: Copy the following source files to the technician PC, rather than using external sources like network shares or removable drives.
segment.target: Copy the following source files to the technician PC, rather than using external sources like network shares or removable drives.

segment.source: This reduces the risk of interrupting the build process from a temporary network issue or from disconnecting the USB device.
segment.target: This reduces the risk of interrupting the build process from a temporary network issue or from disconnecting the USB device.

segment.source: The latest Windows 10 image.
segment.target: The latest Windows 10 image.

segment.source: Mount the ISO file to a drive, and note the drive letter, for example, D.
segment.target: Mount the ISO file to a drive, and note the drive letter, for example, D.

segment.source: This lab assumes the 64-bit architecture, so if you’re using the 32-bit version, change all mentions of x64 to x86.
segment.target: This lab assumes the 64-bit architecture, so if you’re using the 32-bit version, change all mentions of x64 to x86.

segment.source: Copy the D:sourcesinstall.wim file, and save it to the local drive, in the folder: C:ImagesWin10x64.
segment.target: Copy the D:sourcesinstall.wim file, and save it to the local drive, in the folder: C:ImagesWin10x64.

segment.source: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10 with a matching build number as the Windows 10 image.
segment.target: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10 with a matching build number as the Windows 10 image.

segment.source: Language packs with a matching build number and architecture as the Windows 10 image.
segment.target: Language packs with a matching build number and architecture as the Windows 10 image.

segment.source: Save the files using the folder structure: C:Languagesfr-fr x64lp.cab.
segment.target: Save the files using the folder structure: C:Languagesfr-fr x64lp.cab.

segment.source: Language components (Features on Demand) with a matching build number and architecture as the Windows 10 image.
segment.target: Language components (Features on Demand) with a matching build number and architecture as the Windows 10 image.

segment.source: Save the files in the same folder as the main language pack:
segment.target: Save the files in the same folder as the main language pack:

segment.source: C:Languagesfr-fr x64Microsoft-Windows-LanguageFeatures-Basic-fr-fr-Package.cab
segment.target: C:Languagesfr-fr x64Microsoft-Windows-LanguageFeatures-Basic-fr-fr-Package.cab

segment.source: C:Languagesfr-fr x64Microsoft-Windows-LanguageFeatures-TextToSpeech-fr-fr-Package.cab
segment.target: C:Languagesfr-fr x64Microsoft-Windows-LanguageFeatures-TextToSpeech-fr-fr-Package.cab

segment.source: C:Languagesfr-fr x64Microsoft-Windows-LanguageFeatures-Speech-fr-fr-Package.cab
segment.target: C:Languagesfr-fr x64Microsoft-Windows-LanguageFeatures-Speech-fr-fr-Package.cab

segment.source: Optional: Test product keys or distribution product keys that match the Windows 10 image.
segment.target: Optional: Test product keys or distribution product keys that match the Windows 10 image.

segment.source: Note: we don’t cover adding the product keys in this lab.
segment.target: Note: we don’t cover adding the product keys in this lab.

segment.source: Get any drivers, and packages that you’ll need for these devices.
segment.target: Get any drivers, and packages that you’ll need for these devices.

segment.source: Download a Windows app.
segment.target: Download a Windows app.

segment.source: Optional: Download the sample scripts, drivers, and packages that go along with this lab.
segment.target: Optional: Download the sample scripts, drivers, and packages that go along with this lab.

segment.source: Important The Windows ADK for Windows 10, language packs, and Feature-On-Demand (FOD) files must all be from the same build with a matching build number.
segment.target: Important The Windows ADK for Windows 10, language packs, and Feature-On-Demand (FOD) files must all be from the same build with a matching build number.

segment.source: The FODs must also match the architecture of the install.wim.
segment.target: The FODs must also match the architecture of the install.wim.

segment.source: Prepare your technician PC
segment.target: Prepare your technician PC

segment.source: Here’s how to set up your PC for either Lab 1 or Lab 2.
segment.target: Here’s how to set up your PC for either Lab 1 or Lab 2.

segment.source: Copy the Windows image to the local drive
segment.target: Copy the Windows image to the local drive

segment.source: Mount the Windows ISO file that you downloaded (Right-click the file Mount), and note the drive letter, for example, D.
segment.target: Mount the Windows ISO file that you downloaded (Right-click the file Mount), and note the drive letter, for example, D.

segment.source: In File Explorer, create a new folder (example: C:ImagesWin10x64), and copy the sourcesinstall.wim file into the folder.
segment.target: In File Explorer, create a new folder (example: C:ImagesWin10x64), and copy the sourcesinstall.wim file into the folder.

segment.source: This will help speed file creation procedures later on.
segment.target: This will help speed file creation procedures later on.

segment.source: Install the Windows ADK for Windows 10
segment.target: Install the Windows ADK for Windows 10

segment.source: If you have a previous version of the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK), uninstall it.
segment.target: If you have a previous version of the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK), uninstall it.

segment.source: Download the version of the Windows ADK that matches the version of Windows that you’re installing.
segment.target: Download the version of the Windows ADK that matches the version of Windows that you’re installing.

segment.source: Run the installer.
segment.target: Run the installer.

segment.source: Click NextNextAccept to accept the defaults and to join the Customer Experience Improvement Program.
segment.target: Click NextNextAccept to accept the defaults and to join the Customer Experience Improvement Program.

segment.source: Select the following tools:
segment.target: Select the following tools:

segment.source: Deployment Tools
segment.target: Deployment Tools

segment.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE)
segment.target: Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE)

segment.source: Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD)
segment.target: Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD)

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT)
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT)

segment.source: For these labs, you won't need the Windows Performance Toolkit or the Windows Assessment Toolkit.
segment.target: For these labs, you won't need the Windows Performance Toolkit or the Windows Assessment Toolkit.

segment.source: You can clear those check boxes.
segment.target: You can clear those check boxes.

segment.source: Click Install, and then click Yes to confirm.
segment.target: Click Install, and then click Yes to confirm.

segment.source: This may take a few minutes.
segment.target: This may take a few minutes.

segment.source: When the installation is finished, click Close.
segment.target: When the installation is finished, click Close.
